rows.label: qst106004_msg0001
rows.name: Dad! I bring materials!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0002
rows.name:
Welcome back, Tora. Preparation
of workshop all ready.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0003
rows.name:
Me work on expansion parts now.
Kiku, you watch over and make
sure nobody distract me.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0004
rows.name: Leave it to Kiku, Masterpon!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0005
rows.name:
Um... If Hana-chan's going to
be all grown up now, isn't she
going to need new clothes?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0006
rows.name:
Is that right? It shouldn’t
be a problem to leave the
outfit as it is, right?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0007
rows.name:
No, if her physique changes, then
that probably wouldn’t work.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0008
rows.name:
If she grew bigger but kept her
current clothes that’d be awkward.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0009
rows.name: Exactly!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0010
rows.name:
Besides, wouldn't it be cruel
to leave her without any covering
after the modifications?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0011
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0012
rows.name:
Is that so? Hikari and Homura dress
quite boldly too, and I'm a Blade
just like them, so I don't mind!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0013
rows.name: Absolutely not! Out of the question!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0014
rows.name: Hana-chan needs to show more modesty!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0015
rows.name: Hmm... I don't really understand why~

rows.label: qst106004_msg0016
rows.name:
Tora think new costume
important for increasing
sense of cool new power-up!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0017
rows.name: Factor of coolness very important!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0018
rows.name:
Very well. Kiku will make new
costume for younger sister Hana.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0019
rows.name: Really? Nee-sama make costume?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes. Kiku not have many opportunity
to do things for sweet younger sister.
Will make masterpiece costume!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0021
rows.name:
Since Hana become very grown-up,
want costume that looks glamorous!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0022
rows.name:
But not losing sense of
cute. Cute also important.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0023
rows.name:
Also, needs to look cool and powerful!
Is for power-up, after all.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0024
rows.name: Mo-mo... That is lot of requests.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0025
rows.name:
How's she going to fit all
that into one design, eh?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0026
rows.name: Is not possible?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0027
rows.name:
For sake of younger sister Hana...
Kiku make anything possible!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0028
rows.name: Thank you, Nee-sama!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0029
rows.name:
But to make such specific
costume, Kiku probably
need more materials...

rows.label: qst106004_msg0030
rows.name: What kind of things are you after?

rows.label: qst106004_msg0031
rows.name: Cubic Diamond and Ambler Stigma...

rows.label: qst106004_msg0032
rows.name:
Oh, and Genbu-Weave
Cloth important too.

rows.label: qst106004_msg0033
rows.name:
That doesn't sound too hard. Come
on, Hana-chan, let's go find them!

rows.label: qst106004_msg0034
rows.name:
Understood! Hana will bring very
finest materials for new costume!
